scc.releaseInfo:
- For All Platforms - -- Updated XCCDF/CKL result details format to be much more concise -- Updated report "Additional Information" to "Result Analysis" and update logic to help explain why tests fail -- Updated SCAP content based on NIWC content for DISA Q3 2024 release of STIG manuals -- Added option to ignore XCCDF rule 'version' when upgrading manual questions, due to mass re-versioning of DISA STIG's for July 2024 -- Fixed Tailoring on remote SSH scanning
- For Windows - -- Minor improvements to SQL Server scanning, updated error handling and support for ODBC version 18 drivers -- Bugfixes to OVAL cmdlet test
- For Linux - -- Fixed command line -nc and new profile creation on Linux systems -- Added 'ceph' to list of remote filesystems for skipping local filesystem scans
